TestDescription.name: Cross site scripting vulnerability in flowplayer SWF
TestDescription.Description: flowplayer is minimalistic, yet full-featured HTML5/Flash video player. Multiple cross site scripting vulnerabilities were reported in older versions of the flowplayer SWF that may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary Javascript code.
TestDescription.Impact: Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them. An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user. It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of flowplayer.

Reference.database: Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in Flash Version of Flowplayer
